members.name: connect
members.description: Connect to a Bluetooth device

members.name: connectInsecure
members.description: Connect insecurely to a Bluetooth device

members.name: disconnect
members.description: Disconnect from the connected device

members.name: write
members.description: Writes data to the serial port

members.name: available
members.description: Gets the number of bytes of data available

members.name: read
members.description: Reads data from the buffer

members.name: readUntil
members.description: Reads data from the buffer until it reaches a delimiter

params.name: delimiter
params.description: string that you want to search until

members.name: subscribe
members.description: Subscribe to be notified when data is received

params.name: delimiter
params.description: the string you want to watch for

members.name: subscribeRawData
members.description: Subscribe to be notified when data is received

members.name: clear
members.description: Clears data in buffer

members.name: list
members.description: Lists bonded devices

members.name: isEnabled
members.description: Reports if bluetooth is enabled

members.name: isConnected
members.description: Reports the connection status

members.name: readRSSI
members.description: Reads the RSSI from the connected peripheral

members.name: showBluetoothSettings
members.description: Show the Bluetooth settings on the device

members.name: enable
members.description: Enable Bluetooth on the device

members.name: discoverUnpaired
members.description: Discover unpaired devices

members.name: setDeviceDiscoveredListener
members.description: Subscribe to be notified on Bluetooth device discovery. Discovery process must be initiated with the `discoverUnpaired` function.

members.name: setName
members.description: Sets the human readable device name that is broadcasted to other devices

members.name: setDiscoverable
members.description: Makes the device discoverable by other devices

params.name: discoverableDuration
params.description: Desired number of seconds device should be discoverable for
